com.jsoft.linkbuild.listenerAndServerLibrary
Class RegistrationManager

java.lang.Object
  com.jsoft.linkbuild.listenerAndServerLibrary.RegistrationManager

public class RegistrationManager
extends java.lang.Object

RegistrationManager helps the User Application to manage the registrations in the same applications. The applicazions decides to add and remove Registration Service to its. The RegistrationManager class is a singleton and its constructor is hidden to developer. 

    RegistrationManager rm = RegistrationManager.getInstance();
    rm.addRegistration(pw, new MyRule());     
    
    //See you RegistrationRule for more information of Rule interface

          This methos is called from the applications, and it is used to activated RegistrationManager with settings the specific Registration Rules.

Method Detail

getInstance

public static RegistrationManager getInstance()
Return a unique instance of RegistrationManager

Returns:
RegitrazionManager instance

addRegistration

public boolean addRegistration(int password,
                               RegistrationRule rule)
                        throws java.security.AccessControlException
This methos is called from the applications, and it is used to activated RegistrationManager with settings the specific Registration Rules. See the user manual to see more informtion to RegistrationManager

Parameters:
password - the password associated to the application that calls the method
rule - the rule implements by application
Returns:
true if redirect option was setted for application, false otherwise
Throws:
java.security.AccessControlException - It is sent when the password is null, or not correct.

removeRegistration

public boolean removeRegistration(int password)
                           throws java.security.AccessControlException
This methos is called from the applications, and it is used to remove Registration Rule and release Registration Service. See the user manual to see more informtion to RegistrationManager

Parameters:
password - the password associated to the application that calls the method
Returns:
true if servive was removed, false otherwise
Throws:
java.security.AccessControlException - It is sent when the password is null, or not correct.

checkRegistrationFor

protected boolean checkRegistrationFor(java.lang.String app_name)
This methos is called from the Library developer, and it is used to check the Registration app by app_name

Parameters:
app_name - Name of application to check
Returns:
return state of Registration for application

manageRegistration

protected boolean manageRegistration(java.lang.String app_name,
                                     java.lang.String address,
                                     java.lang.String[] fields)
This methos is called from the Library developer, and it is used to verify Registration and Registration Rule, written by App Admin

Parameters:
app_name - Name of application to check
address - Bluetooth Address
fields - Client's fields
Returns:
return state of Registration for application

onClosing

public static boolean onClosing()
Method called when the library is shutdown mode.

Returns:
true, if closing are completed correctly, else otherwise
